mapper.select: select s.product_id, p.brand, p.name, p.image, s.qty from product p , store_stock s where user_store_id = #{userStoreId} and s.product_id = p.id and s.qty <= 10 limit #{recordSize} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from product p , store_stock s where user_store_id = #{userStoreId} and s.product_id = p.id and s.qty <= 10

SELECT s.*, c.name as categoryName, p.name as productName, p.brand as brand, p.image as productImage, p.price as productPrice FROM store_stock s, product p, category c WHERE user_store_id = #{storeId} and s.product_id = p.id and p.category_id = c.id and p.category_id = #{categoryId}
